name: Ms.LemonS
description:
"Welcome to my game, player!"

Ms.LemonS is so glad to see you! She has been waiting for a worthy student for a very long time! Feel like at home and get ready for endless f̶u̶n̶ !

Ms.LemonS wants to test your knowledge! Looks like she has a lot of tasks for you!

Solve Ms.LemonS tasks and use various items and artifacts to make it easier for you!

"But why should I do this?"

Glad you asked! By solving tasks you will earn a lot of stars to spend them in the shop later! Everyone loves shiny stars, right?

"Why am i in agony always losing?"

Glad you asked, my dear player! j̶u̶s̶t̶ d̶o̶n̶t̶ d̶o̶w̶n̶l̶o̶a̶d̶ i̶t̶ you need a strategy to finish the game! without a strategy, everything can go wrong.

Manage your resources correctly to s̶t̶a̶y̶ sane win!)

Unless you want to make Ms.LemonS very irritated.

This game is made in the style of old web flash games, what sets it apart from other new games!

Feel the atmosphere of old flash games!

You can complete the game only ONCE, that means that you won't have a second chance. And how you will complete YOUR game - depends only on YOU. Try your best. Good luck.

Main theme by: Mrthenoronha

Game theme by: Mrthenoronha

Some sounds by: rhodesmas , NoiseCollector , newlocknew , bolkmar , BloodPixelHero

MsLemonS

- Standard version of the game.

MsLemonS++ " Oh oh, it looks like someone messed up the game code! "

- Now you can reset your game progress after completion to get more endings

- You can download this version even if you already played in standart version, and completed it
